channel.title: Using god spells
channel.description: On my buddy's server when I attempt to cast a god spell it just disconnects me, any idea why? Does anyone know if something might need to be altered to make god spells work as I know in normal runescape you have to have a certain magic level and go about casting a certain number of spells in the mage area before being able to use it else where, is there a way around this? If so, would you please inform me and direct me where I can find such coding or what not?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2009, 08:27:22 pm[/size][hr]haha I just realized that no magic works in pvp, anyone know why this would be?

I guess of was never added is my thought what I would do is just take from another source maybe but If your gonna upload be sure to give credit to the server maker who you got that from I hope I helped
